statements: SELECT * FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, progress_percent FROM player_progress WHERE game_level > 5;
SELECT player_id, game_level FROM player_progress ORDER BY game_level DESC;
SELECT player_id, progress_percent FROM player_progress WHERE progress_percent <= 50;
SELECT * FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 2 ORDER BY game_level ASC;
SELECT player_id, game_level, progress_percent FROM player_progress WHERE game_level > 5 ORDER BY progress_percent DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_progress WHERE progress_percent BETWEEN 50.00 AND 75.00;
SELECT player_id, MAX(game_level) AS max_level FROM player_progress GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(movement_history) AS total_movements FROM player_progress ORDER BY total_movements DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_level, progress_percent FROM player_progress WHERE player_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY game_level DESC, progress_percent ASC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerProgress WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT level, progress_percentage FROM PlayerProgress ORDER BY last_played_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MovementHistory WHERE movement_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY movement_id ASC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(movement_id) AS total_movements FROM MovementHistory GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, AVG(progress_percentage) AS average_progress FROM PlayerProgress GROUP BY player_id HAVING AVG(progress_percentage) > 50;
SELECT * FROM PlayerProgress WHERE level > 5 ORDER BY last_played_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, level, progress_percentage AS progress FROM PlayerProgress WHERE progress_percentage < 50 ORDER BY level ASC;

SELECT player_id, level, last_played_date FROM PlayerProgress JOIN MovementHistory ON PlayerProgress.player_id = MovementHistory.player_id WHERE MovementHistory.movement_type = 'jump' ORDER BY last_played_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, AVG(progress_percentage) AS average_progress FROM PlayerProgress GROUP BY player_id HAVING AVG(progress_percentage) > 40;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_movements FROM MovementHistory GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_movements DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 100;
SELECT level, experience FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM movement_history WHERE player_id = 300 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, x_position, y_position FROM movement_history WHERE movement_type = 'jump';
SELECT analysis_result FROM gameplay_analysis WHERE analysis_id = 500;
SELECT player_id, level, experience, time_played FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM movement_history WHERE player_id = 456 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, analysis_result FROM gameplay_analysis WHERE analysis_id < 100 AND player_id = 789;
SELECT player_id, level, experience, time_played FROM player_progress WHERE experience > 500 ORDER BY level ASC;
SELECT player_id, x_position, y_position, movement_type FROM movement_history WHERE player_id = 456 AND x_position < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM player_progress;
SELECT player_name, level_completed FROM player_progress WHERE points_scored > 1000;
SELECT movement_type, movement_timestamp FROM movement_history ORDER BY movement_timestamp DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM gameplay_patterns WHERE pattern_id = 3;
SELECT player_name, feedback_rating, feedback_comment FROM gaming_experience WHERE feedback_rating >= 3 ORDER BY feedback_rating ASC;
SELECT player_name, points_scored FROM player_progress WHERE level_completed > 5 ORDER BY points_scored DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM gameplay_patterns;

SELECT player_name, feedback_rating, feedback_comment FROM player_progress INNER JOIN gaming_experience ON player_progress.player_id = gaming_experience.player_id WHERE feedback_rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC;
SELECT player_id, movement_type, movement_timestamp FROM movement_history WHERE movement_type = 'jump' AND movement_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY movement_timestamp ASC;
SELECT player_name, level_completed, points_scored FROM player_progress WHERE level_completed < 3 AND points_scored < 100 ORDER BY points_scored ASC, level_completed DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_progress;
SELECT level_id, progress_percentage, timestamp FROM player_progress ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, level_id, progress_percentage FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = '12345';
SELECT level_name, difficulty_level FROM level_data WHERE difficulty_level > 5;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(event_id) AS total_events FROM gameplay_events GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_events DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_progress ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC, timestamp ASC
SELECT level_name, difficulty_level FROM level_data WHERE difficulty_level > 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT player_id, movement_type, movement_speed FROM player_movement WHERE movement_speed <= 10
SELECT analysis_type, analysis_result FROM gameplay_analysis ORDER BY player_id, timestamp ASC
SELECT event_type, event_data FROM gameplay_events WHERE event_type = 'win'
